item.title: ü¶úüìÉDocugami KG-RAG Template We worked with @docugami to publish a RAG template that uses their technology to create XML knowledge graphs They als...
item.description:
ü¶úüìÉDocugami KG-RAG Template

We worked with @docugami to publish a RAG template that uses their technology to create XML knowledge graphs

They also benchmarked the RAG performance with LangSmith and found it outperformed OpenAI Assistant API

Read more: https://www.docugami.com/blog/kg-rag-langchain

RT‚ÄÇDocugami
Based on amazing community feedback, we have updated the Docugami KG-RAG Template for @LangChainAI that enables customer to use their Docugami #XML Knowledge Graph as input to #LLMs.

item.title: Gemini ‚ú®is natively multimodal, but how does it stack up against GPT-4V? We put gemini-pro-vision head-to-head with the reigning champ to see how wel...
item.description:
Gemini ‚ú®is natively multimodal, but how does it stack up against GPT-4V?

We put gemini-pro-vision head-to-head with the reigning champ to see how well it could answer questions based on a multimodal slide deck.

The results?  Gemini seems to be a formidable model, matching‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735062294223274245

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
üëæ Discord Tool for Agents üëæ

It‚Äôs been quite a few weeks for @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó JS/TS, and how fitting that our community-only import is a @discord tool in 0.0.206!

Your agents can use it to send messages and pull server info!

Ty Maanethdesilva!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/tools/discord

item.title: Want to use Gemini models via GCP? üöÄThe LangChain x VertexAI integration is now updated to support the recent models! `pip install langchain-commun...
item.description:
Want to use Gemini models via GCP?

üöÄThe LangChain x VertexAI integration is now updated to support the recent models!

`pip install langchain-community==0.0.3`

üè¶VertexAI works natively with GCP - great for enterprise use cases!

item.title: RT WFH: pip install langchain-google-genai
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇWFH
pip install langchain-google-genai


LangChain:‚ÄÇü¶úLangChain ü§ùGemini‚ôäÔ∏è

Gemini API access is out! Access it through LangChain with our first standalone integration package:

`pip install langchain-google-genai`

We're also launching an integration guide showing how to:

üéèStream results
üñºÔ∏èUse it's multimodal capabilities‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1734982565352845428

item.description:
‚≠êÔ∏è Benchmarking semi-structured RAG ‚≠êÔ∏è

We've seen many question about RAG on documents that contain a mixture of text and tables.

To test various semi-structured RAG approaches, we built a LangChain public benchmark on a set of whitepapers and financial reports that contain‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1734984414906699984

item.title: RT Didier Lopes: OpenBB Copilot (built with @LangChainAI) with access to the @openbb_finance platform It still amazes me that just 1 year after ChatGP...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇDidier Lopes
OpenBB Copilot (built with @LangChainAI) with access to the @openbb_finance platform

It still amazes me that just 1 year after ChatGPT, we can build an agent that can perform such a complex workflow flawlessly.

OpenBB Terminal Pro is the future.

item.title: RT Eric Ciarla: Many enterprises want a single interface to access multiple http://Mendable.ai projects (Unique Model + data combinations). We just re...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇEric Ciarla
Many enterprises want a single interface to access multiple http://Mendable.ai projects (Unique Model + data combinations).

We just released our Router Alpha which uses @LangChainAI function calling to dynamically route queries.

Here is what we learned so far. (1/5)
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Logan Anderson: Using @LangChainAI agents and @vercel 's AI package, I built a chat bot that queries a knowledge base and streams results with tool...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇLogan Anderson
Using @LangChainAI agents and @vercel 's AI package, I built a chat bot that queries a knowledge base and streams results with tool outputs. The tools respond with MDX components that are then streamed to a frontend MDX renderer.

Check out the video!

#AI #Chatbot
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: RAG App Slow & Costly? Smarter LLM Chunking With @LangChainAI by Cl√©ment ROBIN fixes that! He uses LangChain for an innovative new s...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇRoger Taylor
RAG App Slow & Costly? Smarter LLM Chunking With @LangChainAI by Cl√©ment ROBIN fixes that!

He uses LangChain for an innovative new strategy that intelligently summarizes docs with LLM first, then chunks into coherent bits for better context. Read more! üöÄ https://buff.ly/4858exu

item.title: RT Waseem: Your choice of embedding model significantly impacts the quality of retrieval for your RAG app @LangChainAI http://chat.langchain.com - is ...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇWaseem
Your choice of embedding model significantly impacts the quality of retrieval for your RAG app

@LangChainAI http://chat.langchain.com - is one of the most helpful RAG apps I've used

Going through the source code you see they are using @Voyage_AI_ by @tengyuma to embed their docs
